channel.title: Cashmere Landscapes
channel.description: I provide landscaping services within the Christchurch community
channel.author: David Sutherland

item.title: Prettyify your Property!
item.description:
Individual Landscaping

Do you want your landscaping to reflect your individual personality? Do you want to get back control of a part of your garden where the NZ jungle has taken over? Or do you just want some general landscaping or fencing work?

If yes to any of the above then get in contact with me, Dave.
item.author: David Sutherland

item.title: Jungle fencing
item.description:
Back breaking jungle clearing

They dont make it easy in Nelson. This job had 45% grade bank that was covered with bush lawyer, blackberrys and the worse ivy and old mans beard. I cleared out 100 cubic metres of jungle and then put a fence around the property to enclose a goat who would take over the jungle encroachment duties! Hard work, steep country but the view was excellent and the results speak for themselves.
item.author: David Sutherland
